boose/BOOSEappTV.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | mysite
boose/BOOSEappTV.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Custom canvas implementation that extends BOOSE.Canvas and adds application-specific features. This class manages the drawing state, drawing surface (Bitmap), and basic geometric drawing operations. Inheritance object Canvas AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members Canvas.Rectangle(int, int, bool) object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Namespace: BOOSEappTV Assembly: BOOSEappTV.dll Syntax public class AppCanvas : Canvas, ICanvas Constructors | Edit this page View Source AppCanvas(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppCanvas class. Declaration public AppCanvas(int width, int height) Parameters Type Name Description int width The initial width of the canvas in pixels. int height The initial height of the canvas in pixels. Fields | Edit this page View Source background_colour The default background colour used when clearing the canvas. Declaration protected Color background_colour Field Value Type Description Color Properties | Edit this page View Source Current Gets the currently active instance of AppCanvas. Declaration public static AppCanvas Current { get; } Property Value Type Description AppCanvas | Edit this page View Source HasLastCircle Gets a value indicating whether a circle has been drawn recently. Declaration public bool HasLastCircle { get; } Property Value Type Description bool | Edit this page View Source HasLastRect Gets a value indicating whether a rectangle has been drawn recently. Declaration public bool HasLastRect { get; } Property Value Type Description bool | Edit this page View Source LastCircleRadius Returns the radius of the last circle that was drawn, or -1 if none has been drawn since the last Clear() or Set(int, int) operation. Declaration public int LastCircleRadius { get; } Property Value Type Description int | Edit this page View Source LastRectParameters Returns the dimensions (Width Height) of the last rectangle drawn, or "-1" if none. Declaration public string LastRectParameters { get; } Property Value Type Description string | Edit this page View Source PenColour Gets or sets the pen colour. (Currently not implemented.) Declaration public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value Type Description object Exceptions Type Condition NotImplementedException Always thrown as this property is not yet implemented. | Edit this page View Source XSize Gets the current width of the canvas in pixels. Declaration public int XSize { get; } Property Value Type Description int | Edit this page View Source Xpos Gets or sets the current X-coordinate of the drawing cursor. Declaration public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value Type Description int | Edit this page View Source YSize Gets the current height of the canvas in pixels. Declaration public int YSize { get; } Property Value Type Description int | Edit this page View Source Ypos Gets or sets the current Y-coordinate of the drawing cursor. Declaration public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value Type Description int Methods | Edit this page View Source Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle centered at the current cursor position (Xpos, Ypos). Declaration public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters Type Name Description int radius The radius of the circle. bool filled If set to true, the circle is filled; otherwise, it is outlined. | Edit this page View Source Clear() Clears the canvas using the default background colour and resets the last drawn shape parameters. Declaration public void Clear() | Edit this page View Source DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current cursor position to the specified coordinates (x, y) and then updates the cursor position to (x, y). Declaration public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters Type Name Description int x The X-coordinate of the line's end point. int y The Y-coordinate of the line's end point. | Edit this page View Source GetCanvas() Returns the current AppCanvas instance. Declaration public static AppCanvas GetCanvas() Returns Type Description AppCanvas The static singleton instance of AppCanvas. | Edit this page View Source MoveTo(int, int) Moves the drawing cursor to the specified coordinates without drawing. Declaration public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters Type Name Description int x The new X-coordinate for the cursor. int y The new Y-coordinate for the cursor. | Edit this page View Source Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle starting from the current cursor position (Xpos, Ypos). Declaration public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters Type Name Description int width The width of the rectangle. int height The height of the rectangle. bool filled If set to true, the rectangle is filled; otherwise, it is outlined. | Edit this page View Source Reset() Resets the drawing state (cursor position and pen size) and clears the canvas. Declaration public void Reset() | Edit this page View Source Set(int, int) Reinitializes the canvas with new dimensions, disposes of old resources, and resets the drawing state. Declaration public void Set(int xSize, int ySize) Parameters Type Name Description int xSize The new width of the canvas. int ySize The new height of the canvas. | Edit this page View Source SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the drawing colour for the pen and brush using RGB values. Declaration public void SetColour(int r, int g, int b) Parameters Type Name Description int r The red component (0-255). int g The green component (0-255). int b The blue component (0-255). | Edit this page View Source Tri(int, int) Prepares the points for drawing a triangle (currently incomplete/not fully implemented). Declaration public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters Type Name Description int width The width of the triangle's base. int height The height of the triangle. | Edit this page View Source WriteText(string) Writes the specified text string onto the canvas at the current cursor position. Declaration public void WriteText(string text) Parameters Type Name Description string text The string to be drawn. | Edit this page View Source getBitmap() Gets the underlying Bitmap object used as the drawing surface. Declaration public object getBitmap() Returns Type Description object The Bitmap instance. Implements BOOSE.ICanvas

boose/BOOSEappTV.html.title: Namespace BOOSEappTV | mysite
boose/BOOSEappTV.html.summary: Namespace BOOSEappTV Classes AppCanvas Custom canvas implementation that extends BOOSE.Canvas and adds application-specific features. This class manages the drawing state, drawing surface (Bitmap), and basic geometric drawing operations. AppCircle AppCommandFactory AppConsole AppDrawTo AppMoveTo AppPenColour AppStar Command to draw a star shape using IAppCanvas. BOOSEForm Represents the main form of the BOOSEappTV application. Provides drawing functionality and handles user interactions. Interfaces IAppCanvas Extended canvas interface for custom BOOSE drawing commands.
